metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9833 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** /cgi-bin/wapopen in Boa 0.94.14rc21 allows the injection of "../.." using the FILECAMERA variable (sent by GET) to read files with root privileges. NOTE: multiple third parties report that this is a system-integrator issue (e.g., a vulnerability on one type of camera) because Boa does not include any wapopen program or any code to read a FILECAMERA variable.

criterions.comment: boa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
